main event: A bright light was observed in the eastern sky, stationary until an aircraft flew overhead, after which the light followed the aircraft to the east.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 16 May 58 at 0315Z,The object was reported by a local resident and his family,Insufficient data was noted for evaluation of the sighting,The report suggests multiple possibilities for the object's identity, including a balloon or aircraft,The sighting took place near Cleveland Airport.
witness description: a resident and his wife and son
